short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the Reddit sidebar when screen dimensions shrink.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of content being covered up by the sidebar when you browse Reddit in the split-screen? This lightweight Chrome extension built using JavaScript and JQuery hides the sidebar when you decrease the width of your window so that you can view content.

https://github.com/simonwarchol/Hidebar
